Krosbi Mensah (amụrụ na 5 Machị 1947) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana nke jere ozi dị ka onye omeiwu nke 4th Republic of Ghana, ọ nọchitere anya Afram Plains North. Ọ bụ onye otu National Democratic Congress.
A mụrụ Krosbi Mensah na 5 Maachị 1947 na Eastern Region nke Ghana, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Prince of Peace College wee nweta Asambodo Nkụzi Ọzụzụ (GCE)l.
Mensah bụbu onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Afram Plains North na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ghana site na 7 Jenụwarị 1993 ruo 7 Jenụwaị 1997, Ọ bụkwa onye ọchụnta ego.

Mensah bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu nke 1st na 2nd parliament nke 4th Republic of Ghana maka Afraim Plains North Constituency, site na Jenụwarị 1993 ruo Jenụwarụ 2001. Ọ gara ụlọ omeiwu mbụ ka e kwupụtachara na ọ meriri na ntuli aka Disemba 1992.  Ọ jigidere oche ya ọzọ na ntuli aka 1996 ka ọ nwetasịrị 72% nke mkpokọta ntuli aka, ọ meriri n'oge ntuli aka izugbe Ghana nke December 1996 na tiketi National Democratic Congress maka Afraim Plains North Constituency na Eastern Region nke Ghana.  Ọ turu vootu 18,832 n'ime votu ziri ezi a tụrụ na-anọchite anya 61.70% n'aka ndị mmegide ya Augustine Siaw onye NPP, Amidu Tanko onye PNC, Albert Quarcoo-Zah onye CPP na Krosbi Mensah onye NDC onye nwetara 4,376 votes, 1,684 votes, 1, 1, 1.  votu na 0 votu n'otu n'otu. Joseph Tsatsu Agbenu mechara nọchie ya n'afọ 2001.
Mensah bụ Onye Kraịst. Ọ bụ nna Betty Krosbi Mensah, onye na-eje ozi kemgbe 2017 dị ka onye omeiwu maka Afram Plains North, otu mpaghara ọ jere ozi dị ka onye otu.
